title: Silver 5 Mid LFT
body:
Hey guys, 

Looking to work toward end of season rewards and have some fun playing ranked 5's. Predominantly play Ekko, Nidalee, Vel'koz, and Orianna but I can manage a fairly wide variety of picks reasonably well. I'm relatively active, playing 2-3 hours on average per day but often more. Feel free to message me in game if you have a spot free. 

Cheers! 

Summoner name: RevolvingElk
